mapper.select: select * from ( select /*+ INDEX_DESC(INFO_QNA pk_board) */ rownum rn, QID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, AN_TITLE, AN_COMMENT, CREATED_DATE, ANSWER_DATE, SECRET from INFO_QNA where QID > 0 and rownum >0 and rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) ) where rn >(#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
select * from INFO_QNA order by QID desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INFO_QNA (TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, SECRET, CREATED_DATE, ANSWER_DATE, AN_TITLE, AN_COMMENT) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{secret}, systimestamp, systimestamp, '확인중', '확인 후 영업시간(09:30 ~ 17:30)내에 답변드리겠습니다.')
mapper.update: update INFO_QNA set AN_TITLE = #{an_title}, AN_COMMENT = #{an_comment}, ANSWER_DATE = systimestamp where QID = ${qid}
